body: I hate NTR. I mean,I really hate it. But for some reason, I was okay with it here. Just a little bit. But for that to be the place where the girls got their first look at his dick and decide to become his women put a tear in my eye. Well, we'll see how much they mean it.
As someone who has no problem with NTR. Imo it should be clear NTR from pretty much the start, here it was unnecessary.
i don't like ntr but once i start i gotta sit it through till the end.
daaaammnn didnt expect it to turn ntr lol
Big ntr fan but here makes no sense and it just ruined the thing completely. Felt like it was added just to get the ntr tag a common thing a lot of these do now
Perfected by the ntr

It's like going on a journey to slay demon lord but in the middle there's suddenly Alien then they never speak about it again in the last chapter. I supposed this is what you called big lipped alligator

The thing about this series is the author gave us hope that it's a vanilla ending because of that chapter where they do some pseudo wedding. But the epilogue, final chapter the author gave us a NTR bomb it turns out that they send a sex video to the MC.
It was so good, but had to be ruined with ntr

Honestly, whenever i see these type of scenarios (older person screwing someone much younger) regardless of how good the plot, art, or fap, i always want the younger one(s) to go off and be slutty with other their own age, after having learned what they do/dont like. Lol it finally kinda happens here but it feels so wrong the way its used to get the MC to simply be rougher with them.

My search continues for such a situation it seems.
tbh the ntr was unnecessary
Toxic whores

That pathetic cuck ruin his Health, now just for 2 pathetic WHORES, he is reducing his life span and will always be stressed to be ntred. He should have never let these bitch in his life this pathetic cuck 😬👎👎👎👎👎👎 The author probably draw his own pathetic life
this is the shittiest doujin ever
Mc's face still gets me everytime.
I don't mind ntr, but suddenly thrusting it in a story where it doesn't make sense is not good
if they love him why would they fuck other guys lol..
So they say they like him but they will fuck anyone what nympho bitches Mc I suggest u dump this bitches and move on.

To explain, the author is forcing an ntr kink into a plotline where it doesnt make sense - the concept is the girls are sluts and they like him but they like sex (with anyone) too, and they like sex with him when hes angry and jealous even more - so they cheat on him to make him jealous so he'll fuck them rough. The story ends with the girls still cheating regularly while looking forward to being fucked by the uncle while the uncle gets physically fit to be better at sex to outperform all the other guys the girls are fucking. Wouldve been better if it had a final chapter about the girls enjoying sex with him the most.
Everything was going well at first three chapter and then some shit happened at 4th one but well the story still continues
I mean is it cheating when this isn’t supposed to happen in the first place? Idk but dude didn’t care in the end.
so he is not gonna ask why did they fuck someone else and if they love him, then that's cheating.
besides 4th chapter i like this
Top 10 in school but Top 2 in sluttery. Good read i guess
pages 45-60, Men Friends gang.......*
I just don't understand the NTR??? And I fucking like NTR but this one just comes out of nowhere. It just doesn't make sense. If you gonna continue be advised NTR keeps going
Yeah it's decent don't listen to cyst
@xyst16 the plot is really twisted but I also thought it is really a fucked up one, but I was wrong (since I cannot read the raw accurately) it's going to be decent belive me 😶
